channel.title: Episode 17: "Special Guest: Rachel Andrew"
channel.description:
[http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-17-special-guest-rachel-andrew/][1]
Ian and Andrey sit down with special guest [Rachel Andrew][2] @rachelandrew from [EdgeOfMySeat.com][3], to discuss [Perch][4], the really little CMS, the new Bootstrapped.fm forums, marketing, customer support, product dependencies, how important personal visibility is to your business, content management systems, writing and speaking, and self-publishing.
[1]: http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-17-special-guest-rachel-andrew/ [2]: http://rachelandrew.co.uk/ [3]: http://www.edgeofmyseat.com/ [4]: http://grabaperch.com/

item.title: Episode 17: "Special Guest: Rachel Andrew"
item.dc:creator: andyjohnson
item.description:
Just finished it. Great insight @rachelandrew. Thanks for sharing and much success with Perch!
